mosinstall.name: Most Read Content
mosinstall.author: Mambo China Team
mosinstall.description: This module shows a list of published content items that have been viewed the most.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: show_front
param.label: Frontpage Items
param.description: Show/Hide items designated for the Frontpage - only works when in Content Items only mode

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (default is 5)

param.name: catid
param.label: Category ID
param.description: Selects items from a specific Category or set of Categories (to specify more than one Category, seperate with a comma , ).

param.name: secid
param.label: Section ID
param.description: Selects items from a specific Secion or set of Sections (to specify more than one Section, seperate with a comma , ).

param.name: target
param.label: Target
param.description: Target window when the link is clicked

param.name: show_headline
param.label: Show Headline
param.description: Show/Hide the first content item as headline

param.name: moduletitle
param.label: Module Title
param.description: User defined module title, Only use when headline shown

param.name: seccat_style
param.label: Section/Category Style
param.description: style of section/category: list or blog

param.name: titlelength
param.label: Title Length
param.description: The max length of item title in chars to display, Default 40

param.name: datedisplay
param.label: Date Display
param.description: The display of item created date
